short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all passwords from the users Chrome Password Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes all passwords from the users Chrome Password Manager.  This can be used in conjunction with the Admin Console security setting to disallow the use of the Chrome Password Manager.  This is to provide heightened security for environments where users have access to sensitive information and saved passwords are an unacceptable risk.
